meanings.definition: A swelling or growth in the body, typically benign or non-cancerous.
meanings.sent1: The doctor found a small tumor in my leg.
meanings.sent2: She had a tumor removed from her arm last week.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tumor in the plant made it look like it had a little bump.
meanings.sent4: The tumor of books on her desk seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The tumor on the tree trunk was covered in moss, making it blend in.

meanings.definition: An abnormal mass of tissue in the body, often caused by uncontrolled cell growth.
meanings.sent1: The MRI revealed a large tumor in his brain.
meanings.sent2: The biopsy confirmed that it was a cancerous tumor.
meanings.sent3: The tumor in the fridge turned out to be a forgotten sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like a tumor, infecting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The tumor of lies he told eventually caught up with him.
